sect2.title: ABI
sect2.para: An application binary interface (ABI) describes the low-level interface between a computer program and the operating system. Specifying the ABI is part of the process of fine tuning the cross-compilation toolchain for the selected platform. A good overview of ABIs is provided by the following wikipedia entry:
